task.title: How to Configure MarkLogic Data Source Drivers

prereq.p: Available in the Enterprise edition only. supports MarkLogic version 4.0 or later.

context.p: To configure a data source for MarkLogic, follow this procedure:

step.cmd: Download the XCC Java distribution zip file from: .
Select MarkLogic from the driver Type drop-down list.

Click the Add Files button and select the MarkLogic driver file from the lib folder of the archive that you downloaded and unzipped. The driver file name is marklogic-xcc-{server_version}.jar, where {server_version} is the MarkLogic server version.
Continue on to configure your MarkLogic Connection.
